title: Did you need to submit form IHT400 to HMRC?
header: Did you need to submit form IHT400 to HMRC?
question: Did you need to submit form IHT400 to HMRC?
paragraph1: Using the Inheritance Tax checker is not the same as submitting a form to HMRC. The checker will tell you if you need to submit form IHT400, or if the estate is an ‘excepted estate’ and you do not need to submit a form.

estateValueCompleted.required: Select 'No' if you did not need to submit a form to HMRC
